solution_line_template: The total of minutes the treatment will take is {treatment_duration_hours} hours x {minutes_per_hour} minutes/hour = <<{treatment_duration_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes

After {total_minutes} minutes has passed the total amount of drops that the patient will receive is {drops_per_minute} drops/minute x {total_minutes} minutes = <<{drops_per_minute}*{total_minutes}={total_drops}>>{total_drops} drops
Knowing the number of drops, we know that the patient has taken {total_drops} drops x {ml_per_100_drops} ml/{drops_for_ml_conversion} drops = {total_ml} ml
